item.description:
Come join us for the ultimate post St. Patrick's Day hangover cure. What better way to clear that green dye and Guinness out of your system than to sweat it out chasing a frisbee. We'll be meeting at 8PM at the Cambridge Common baseball diamond which is located a couple blocks north of Harvard Square. We generally play from about 8-10PM and then go out for food and drinks.

Before attending our events, please review our About Us page.

We recommend you bring a light-colored shirt for visibility's sake and a change of clothes. We supply all of the equipment necessary so there's really nothing else you need to bring besides your smiling face.

Our Organizers pay out of pocket for the frisbees, frisbee batteries, lighted lanyards, glowsticks, field cones and first aid kits. Consider bringing a couple bucks or visiting our Amazon Wishlist to support our equipment costs. Our group is free and will always be that way but your non-obligatory donations are certainly appreciated!

Here's a link to Cambridge Common's Map. Parking at Cambridge Common's is tricky and we highly recommend you take the MBTA to Harvard Square. If you have any questions about our group, don't hesitate to contact our Organizers! See you on the field!

Please note our new start time 8PM. The Vampire Jim (me) and current guardian of the gear can't come out in the daylight.

Cheers,

The Other Jim
item.name: Ultimate Bloody Mary - New 8PM start time
